comments: One of the absolute worst professors I\'ve ever had. She is so unbelievably unorganized and makes it so difficult to understand what\'s happening in the class. As one of the only non-native Spanish speakers in the class, I felt completely ostracized and left in the dark for the majority of the course.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  HILARIOUS  GROUP PROJECTS
comments: Extremely knowledgable professor. She definitely knows what she is talking about. I have to admit, her class is disorganized and at the end she goes a little over board with the projects, but she isn\'t a tough grader. She assings long reading but she goes over them in class. Go to office hours if you are lost, she is extremely helpful!

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: By far one of the most engaging Spanish Literature professors. She knows what she\'s teaching, so she might come off wrong, but she just has high expectations for everyone in the class. confused? ASK! she\'ll literally tell you what she wants/expects from you.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Probably the most confusing and unorganized professor ever! Sara is a wonderful person and willing to help students get the best grade possible, but you never know what is due, when it\'s due and the assignments never make any sense! She prefers giving creative assignments so that\'s a plus I guess. But has high expectations of students.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She is a very intelligent woman and she knows her material very well. I did not particularly like how energetic she was but i must admit that she is also a very funny professor. She is also a very helpful professor and is always willing to help.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Sara is caring and a very helpful professor even though the class has no structure if you read all the texts her midterms are easy. If you are interested in colonial literature I highly recommend her she is amazing

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I think the only reason why a person would not like this class is because they are not interested in the subject matter. She is passionate about her work and shows that she cares about her students. She doesn\'t give hard work, she just want\'s creativity. One midterm, one group project, and a final.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She is very hard to follow, best advice is to participate and/or go to her office hours to get further explanations and clarifications. She is very helpful but harsh at some times, just don\'t be afraid of some criticism.

comments: She is the best professor I ever had in college. I learned to love learning through her incredible passion and enthusiasm. The is great. Not easy to get a good grade if you are not into the class. You are required to work hard!

comments: Dr. Poot Herrera is an excellent Professor. She takes her job extremely serious and will assist you in any way she can as long as you put forth the effort. She detest lazy people so if you want an easy A don\'t take her class. If you want to learn and get challanged...she is the right professor for you!

comments: Literally the worst professor I\'ve ever had. Lectures and assignments disorganized and pointless. Often says one thing in office hours and another in class. Belittles students and makes it seem like she\'s doing you a huge favor by giving you credit for an assignment or reading you actually did. Pretentious but very little literary insight. AVOID.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: It\'s easy to get a good grade in this class, but if you actually care about the subject and want to learn something, avoid this professor like the plague. Also, she is the most disorganized instructor I have ever had to deal with, including those from high school.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I agree with the person below, this professor is COMPLETELY disorganized, the people who rated her highly are crazy. She gives the appearance of being easy to approach or talk to, but if you go to her office hours she never has time for you. She WILL humiliate you in class and make fun of the projects or tests you turn in. She is extremely crude.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Classes have no structure and her lectures have no point to them. We didn\'t ever actually learn anything from her, she babbles on about stuff that has nothing to do with anything. I honestly rarely know what shes talking about. Lots of projects and you will never know what your homework is or when its due. very unorganized and hard to follow
